languages.text: 対象は{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。対象が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}が−10減少し、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が−1減少する。
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target. If the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} are reduced by −10 and its {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.

traits.locale_text: 対象は{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。対象が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}が−10減少し、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が−1減少する。

languages.text: Inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à la cible. Si elle échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} sont réduites de −10 et son {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de −1.
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target. If the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} are reduced by −10 and its {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.

traits.locale_text: Inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à la cible. Si elle échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} sont réduites de −10 et son {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de −1.

languages.text: Inflige {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} al objetivo. Si el objetivo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} se reducen en −10 y su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} se reduce en −1.
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target. If the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} are reduced by −10 and its {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.

traits.locale_text: Inflige {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} al objetivo. Si el objetivo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} se reducen en −10 y su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} se reduce en −1.

languages.text: 对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target. If the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} are reduced by −10 and its {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.

traits.locale_text: 对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1点。

languages.text: Fügt dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zu. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} des Ziels auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, werden {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} um −10 reduziert. Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} wird um −1 reduziert.
languages.original_text: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target. If the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} are reduced by −10 and its {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.

traits.locale_text: Fügt dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zu. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} des Ziels auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, werden {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} um −10 reduziert. Der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} wird um −1 reduziert.

languages.text: Наносит цели {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}. Цель совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, и в случае провала ее {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} уменьшаются на 10, а ее {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} — на 1.

languages.text: Hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} verir. Hedef; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçemezse {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} nitelikleri 10, {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} ise 1 azalır.
